articles.author: Lungani Zama
articles.title: Targets-obsessed SA cricket needs to stop looking back
articles.description: There are few things more deflating than watching a tournament when your team is no longer in it, writes Lungani Zama.
articles.content: There are few things more deflating than watching a tournament when your team is no longer in it, writes Lungani Zama.

articles.author: Lynn Butler
articles.title: SA20 to 'elevate the game' as Newlands set to host blockbuster final
articles.description: Commissioner Graeme Smith says the SA20 league will look to elevate cricket ahead of its second edition, with Newlands set to host the final next year.
articles.content:
The countdown has begun for the SA20 league, with 50 days left until the opening encounter between the Sunrisers Eastern Cape and the Joburg Super Kings at St George's Park in Gqeberha.
The SA20 was… [+116 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
